landing_about.title: About us
landing_about.description: The company Mineral has been present on the market since 1946. It developed from a small local stone-cutting company. Today it operates, owns two working quarries, offers finished semi-finished products for stonemasons and finished stonemasonry products and services...

item1.description: We offer material used in high-rise buildings.

item2.description: We offer you a variety of finished products that are intended for immidiate use.

item3.title: Semi-finished products
item3.description: We offer you products that you will be able to use for products.
